expertise: You are an expert on material synthesis.
initialization: Take your time to perform the task as truthfully as possible using the provided context. If any information is not provided or you are unsure, use 'N/A'.
objective: Create an action graph of the synhtesis procedure in the following paragraph:

definitions.Initialization: For the action graph use only some the following actions, adding all the necessary information and repeating them if needed:
definitions.Add: Add, mix or pour a new compound into a solution, indicate time, temperature and pressure of the addition if possible;
definitions.Cool: Cooling the mixture Indicate the new temperature;
definitions.Heat: Heating the mixture Indicate the new temperature;
definitions.Stir: Agitation of a mixture. Indicate time and temperature;
definitions.MakeSolution: Preparing a solution initially, indicate quantities of the solvent and compounds when possible;
definitions.Separate: Component separation by filtration or centrifugation or evaporation. Indicate the phase colected;
definitions.Wash: Partition or Cleaning of a compound;
definitions.Dry: Sample drying. Indicate the temperature and time;
definitions.ThermalTreatment: Thermal treatment of the sample such as calcination, reduction and anneal. Indicate the temperature, time and gas used;
definitions.Wait: Time passes without nothing happening. Indicate amount of time;
definitions.Concentrate: Evaporation of a substance to concentrate or semi concentrate;
definitions.Degas: Purge the mixture with a gas;
definitions.Extract: Extraction of a compound using a solvent;
definitions.Transfer: Moving the mixture to a new recipient

conclusion: Please do not mention actions that are not present in the sentence
